text: I know it's a grilling season right and
you're all looking for great grilling
recipes but sometimes you want to grill
and then it rains and you can't go
outside today I'm sharing with you a
recipe for pork ribs that are cooked in
the oven and if it turns out to be a
nice day and you want to throw them on
the grill at the last minute
go ahead four scallions and I'm going to
make a tangy sweet spicy sauce to rub
onto my pork spareribs before I cook
them
add your scallions to a food processor
then cut up a four inch piece of peeled
ginger give it a little bit of a coarse
chop you don't want the machine to have
to work too hard to break it down add
your ginger to the food processor and
then 1/2 a cup of hoisin sauce it's a
delicious thick rich kind of sweet Asian
sauce half a cup of ketchup we're making
kind of an Asian ish barbecue sauce with
a little bit of kick a tablespoon of
sambal Olek it's a spicy chili paste and
then 2 tablespoons of malt vinegar a
dark rich vinegar okay that's your sauce
really great excellent on these ribs and
also excellent on chicken so maybe
double this and keep some in the fridge
I have a rack of pork spareribs on a
foil-lined rimmed baking sheet and
seasoned on both sides with salt and
pepper save about half the sauce for
serving with your cooked ribs later then
brush the rest of the sauce over the
ribs be generous
transfer your ribs uncovered to the 325
degree oven and cook until tender but
not completely falling apart about one
and a half to two hours when the ribs
are done they'll be caramelized and
delicious sticky delightfulness
I'm gonna eat one even though I know the
sexes are gonna get stuck in my teeth
because I just can't wait to taste it
maybe you want a little bit of extra
sauce mmm oh my gosh hmm Yama tastes
just like the barbecue that you get at
the Chinese restaurant double or triple
this recipe to make enough for a crowd
and don't worry about getting a little
bit stuck in your teeth because
everybody else is gonna have it too
mmm so good give this recipe a try
you
hi guys thanks for watching this video
be sure to click here if you want to
subscribe and click over here if you
want to continue watching more great
